Salary data : HerHoopStats
Team rosters: ESPN
Downloaded in Jan

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


load the data
```{r}
salaries <- read_csv("data/wnba_salaries.csv")
wnba_teams <-read_csv("data/wnba_teams.csv")
```
practice
```{r}
anti_join(salaries,wnba_teams, by = c("name" = "player_name"))

anti_join(wnba_teams,salaries, by = c("player_name" = "name"))
```
Isabelle Harrison and Lou Lopez Senechal are not matched
Asia (AD) Durr is also not matched

combine the tables
```{r}
full_join(wnba_teams, salaries, by = c("player_name" = "name")) %>% 
  arrange(desc(contract_amt))

wnba_teams %>% full_join()
```
